Kris_Tyler:
{{short description|American singer-songwriter}} {{Infobox musical artist | name = Kris Tyler | image = | image_size = | background = solo_singer | origin = [[Omaha, Nebraska]], United States | instrument = [[Vocals]] | genre = [[Country music|Country]] | occupation = [[Singing|Singer]] | years_active = 1997–present | label = [[Rising Tide Records|Rising Tide]] | associated_acts = | website = }} '''Kris Tyler''' (born in [[Omaha, Nebraska]]) is an American [[country music]] artist. Tyler has released one studio album; she also charted two singles on the ''[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]'' [[Hot Country Songs|Hot Country Singles & Tracks]] chart. Her highest charting single, "What a Woman Knows," peaked at No. 45 in 1997. ==Discography== ===Albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! style="width:14em;"| Title ! style="width:18em;"| Album details |- ! scope="row"| ''What a Woman Knows'' | * Release date: January 13, 1998 * Label: [[Rising Tide Records]] |} ===Singles=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! rowspan="2"| Year ! rowspan="2" style="width:14em;"| Single ! colspan="2"| Peak chart
